#summary The border-bottom property sets the width, style, and color of the bottom border of a box.
#labels about-css,is-css-property,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSProperties Properties] > *border-bottom*

== Usage ==

== Values ==

  * `[ <border-width> || <border-style> || 'border-bottom-color' ]`
  * `inherit`
